title: Most used excuse to be a retard ... every game, ever

replies.body:
The most used excuse by feeders is defiantly LAG..  normally proficient with ADC`s that feed..  ADC dies within the first 5 mins.. next thing you see is  " SO MUCH LAG " " LAG" " IM LAGGING".. 

Fuc king idiots

*definitely
defiant is when you rebel or to go against for example in defiance to the king I rallied the men and went to war. I'm not much of a spelling/grammar nazi but people always fucking get these two words wrong and I don't know how, they arn't even on a phonetic level to be mistaken when spelt.

> [{quoted}](name=Dat Feel,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OXPjvTNR,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-08-14T09:18:21.446+0000)
>
> *definitely
> defiant is when you rebel or to go against for example in defiance to the king I rallied the men and went to war. I'm not much of a spelling/grammar nazi but people always fucking get these two words wrong and I don't know how, they arn't even on a phonetic level to be mistaken when spelt.

It's because if you spell definetely which is how a lot of people think it is spelt the autocorrect corrects it to defiantly rather then definitely

Yes that makes sense and I do believe that that does occur as you say but 9/10 times I'm pretty sure where I've seen it posted hasn't been because of an auto--correct malfunction, for example a facebook post or even op's post on this site
and then after the game ends, he will be the first to exit the chat window #prideful #noob

Or you get some "my first time playing ____ champ" as though there's no custom, no beginner bots, no intermediate bots to try out, no quick videos called champion spotlight, no youtube to do slight research on. They feed and it's everyone else's fault for not bending over and taking it.

Every bad player is secretly a boneless slime man, as shown by the accurate diagram of his neck bend-ability.

It's alright the first time for games that aren't recorded and are easy to set up like tic tac toe, but with LoL it's unacceptable.
yes, oh wait you said dem feels not dat feel my bad...
